plays.text: Penalty to Brad Chartrand 2 minutes for Interference Dan Hinote
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Hooking Steve Reinprecht

Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Charging Aaron Miller
Penalty to Mattias Norstrom 2 minutes for Tripping Steve Reinprecht
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Elbowing Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Roughing Mattias Norstrom
Goal scored by Craig Johnson assisted by Jaroslav Modry and Zigmund Palffy
